spatial_accuracy.notes: Major disorientation and mislabeling. Bed-1 in the render corresponds to Bed-2 in the plan, and Bed-2 in the render corresponds to Bed-1 in the plan. Door swings are inconsistent with the 2D source, and the orientation of the en-suite bathrooms has been flipped or shifted.

structural_fidelity.notes: Severe hallucination of a secondary balcony and staircase near the foyer entrance which is not present in the original plan. The top deck area is poorly defined and lacks the floor-to-ceiling glass interface shown in the schematic.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture layout generally follows the plan though text overlays for room dimensions are distorted or overlapping. The dining table scale is slightly exaggerated.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good lighting and shadows. Clean wall geometry and identifiable materials. Orthographic projection is well-executed despite architectural inaccuracies.

detected_errors.description: Bed-1 and Bed-2 labels and placements are swapped compared to the source 2D plan.
Hallucinated wooden deck/staircase structure added to the bottom left entrance area near the foyer.
Door swing for the Foyer and Bed-3 are oriented incorrectly relative to the wall junctions in the plan.
Text labels for room dimensions are distorted (e.g., 'IDNING' instead of 'DINING' and '13'9' becoming '13"').
Missing specific utility wall dividers and accurate window apertures in the top deck zone.
